mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERS(order_id, member_id, product_id, order_date) VALUES(seq_orders.nextval, #{memberId}, #{productId}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT O.ORDER_ID, O.MEMBER_ID, O.PRODUCT_ID, O.ORDER_DATE, O.STATUS, P.NAME, P.PRICE FROM ORDERS O JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_ID = O.PRODUCT_ID WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
